p: For anatomical observations, non-galled leaves and mature rolling galls ( n ≥ 5) were fixed in FAA (formalin, acetic acid, 50% ethanol, 1:1:18) ( Johansen, 1940), dehydrated in an n-buthanolic series and embedded in Paraplast ® ( Kraus and Arduin, 1997). The material was sectioned (12 μm) in a rotatory microtome (Leica 2035 BIOCUT ®), deparaffinized, and stained in astra blue-safranin 9:1 (v/v) ( Bukatsch, 1972, modified to 0.5%). The slides were mounted with varnish Acrilex ® ( Paiva et al., 2006), and the images were obtained with a photomicroscope (Leica ICC50 HP ®).
